verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Waipeleka Roho,
waipeleka Roho yako Ee Bwana,
roho yako ee Bwana
(Ee Bwana)
(nawe waufanya upya,
uso wa dunia aleluya) x2.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Njoo Roho Mtakatifu,
uijaze nyoyo ya waamini,
na uwashe ndani yao
upendo wako.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ee Nafsi yangu,
umhimidi Bwana,
wewe Mungu wangu,
na imejifanya kuwa
mkuu sana.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ewe Bwana Mungu wangu,
jinsi yalivyo mengi matendo
yako na dunia imejaa
mali yako.
